node.name: Topcased UML Editor
node.shortdescription:
Topcased UML Editor is a graphical editor compliant with the UML 2.2/2.3 specification.
10 UML diagrams are supported :

  • Package
  • Class
  • Object
  • Component
  • Deployment
  • Use Case
  • Sequence
  • Activity
  • State Machine
  • Composite Structure

State machines can be graphically simulated.
Topcased also includes MDE generic capabilities like docx/odt document generator, OCL checker, requirements management and more that can be used with UML tools.
node.body:
Topcased UML Editor is a graphical editor compliant with the UML 2.2/2.3 specification.
10 UML diagrams are supported :

  • Package
  • Class
  • Object
  • Component
  • Deployment
  • Use Case
  • Sequence
  • Activity
  • State Machine
  • Composite Structure

State machines can be graphically simulated.
Topcased also includes MDE generic capabilities like docx/odt document generator, OCL checker, requirements management and more that can be used with UML tools.
